description: Learn how to make haloumi and zucchini fritters paired with a veggie salad. Cook the fritters ahead of time, then whip up this dinner in a flash.
name: Haloumi Fritters & Shredded Veggie Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
1 large lemon, 1/2 zested and juiced, 1/2 cut into wedges
1 bunch asparagus, trimmed, peeled into ribbons

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour in a large bowl. Whisk in eggs until smooth and combined. Fold in zucchini, haloumi and half of the onion. Season with pepper.

Heat half of the oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Place 4 x 1/4 cupfuls of mixture in pan and spread out slightly. Cook for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Repeat with both remaining oil and fritter mixture to make a total of 12 fritters.
Meanwhile, combine zest, lemon juice and yoghurt in a small bowl. Season with pepper.
Arrange salad and asparagus on a large platter. Top with fritters and remaining onion. Dollop with yoghurt mixture, season with pepper and serve with lemon wedges.
